languages.text: {n}Взмахнув руками, Уралон гневно гремит:{/n} "Хула на Истинных Богов не будет прощена, запечатаны будут уста исторгших ее, отсечены будут руки, сотворившие ее, исторгнуты и побиваемы будут души, изродившие ее!"

{n}With a solemn gesture of his hands, Uralon thunders in fury,{/n} "Let those who blaspheme against the True Gods beg forgiveness in vain, let their lips be sealed, let their hands be severed, let their souls be reaped and scourged!"
languages.original_text: {n}Взмахнув руками, Уралон гневно гремит:{/n} "Хула на Истинных Богов не будет прощена, запечатаны будут уста исторгших ее, отсечены будут руки, сотворившие ее, исторгнуты и побиваемы будут души, изродившие ее!"

{n}With a solemn gesture of his hands, Uralon thunders in fury,{/n} "Let those who blaspheme against the True Gods beg forgiveness in vain, let their lips be sealed, let their hands be severed, let their souls be reaped and scourged!"

languages.text: {n}乌拉隆双手做出庄严的手势，发出了愤怒的吼声。{/n}“让那些亵渎真神之人徒劳地乞求怜悯吧！让他们的嘴唇被封死！让他们的双手被斩断！让他们的灵魂被收割、被鞭笞！”
languages.original_text: {n}With a solemn gesture of his hands, Uralon thunders in fury,{/n} "Let those who blaspheme against the True Gods beg forgiveness in vain, let their lips be sealed, let their hands be severed, let their souls be reaped and scourged!"

traits.locale_text: {n}乌拉隆双手做出庄严的手势，发出了愤怒的就吼声。{/n}“让那些亵渎真神之人徒劳地乞求怜悯吧！让他们的嘴唇被封死！让他们的双手被斩断！让他们的灵魂被收割、被鞭笞！”

languages.text: {n}En faisant un geste solennel de la main, Uralon gronde avec rage :{/n} « Que ceux qui blasphèment à l'encontre des dieux véritables implorent le pardon en vain, que leurs lèvres soient scellées à jamais, que leurs mains soient coupées, que leur âme soit arrachée et flagellée ! »
languages.original_text: {n}With a solemn gesture of his hands, Uralon thunders in fury,{/n} "Let those who blaspheme against the True Gods beg forgiveness in vain, let their lips be sealed, let their hands be severed, let their souls be reaped and scourged!"

traits.locale_text: {n}En faisant un geste solennel de la main, Uralon gronde avec rage :{/n} « Que ceux qui blasphèment à l'encontre des dieux véritables implorent le pardon en vain, que leurs lèvres soient scellées à jamais, que leurs mains soient coupées, que leur âme soit arrachée et flagellée ! »

languages.text: {n}両手で威厳溢れる仕草をすると同時に、ウラロンは怒りの声を上げる。{/n}「真の神々を冒涜する者は無駄に許しを請い、唇を封じられ、手を切断され、魂を刈り取られ、鞭打たれよ！」
languages.original_text: {n}With a solemn gesture of his hands, Uralon thunders in fury,{/n} "Let those who blaspheme against the True Gods beg forgiveness in vain, let their lips be sealed, let their hands be severed, let their souls be reaped and scourged!"

traits.locale_text: {n}両手で威厳溢れる仕草をすると同時に、ウラロンは怒りの声を上げる。{/n}「真の神々を冒涜する者は無駄に許しを請い、唇を封じられ、手を切断され、魂を刈り取られ、鞭打たれよ！」

languages.text: {n}Con un ademán solemne, Uralon brama con furia atronadora:{/n} «¡Que quienes blasfemen contra los Dioses Verdaderos supliquen su perdón en vano, que sus labios sean sellados, sus manos cercenadas y sus almas segadas y flageladas!».
languages.original_text: {n}With a solemn gesture of his hands, Uralon thunders in fury,{/n} "Let those who blaspheme against the True Gods beg forgiveness in vain, let their lips be sealed, let their hands be severed, let their souls be reaped and scourged!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un ademán solemne, Uralon brama con furia atronadora:{/n} «¡Que quienes blasfemen contra los Dioses Verdaderos supliquen su perdón en vano, que sus labios sean sellados, sus manos cercenadas y sus almas segadas y flageladas!».

languages.text: {n}Mit einer feierlichen Geste donnert Uralon zornig los:{/n} "Alle, die Blasphemie gegen die Wahren Götter begehen, sollen vergeblich um Gnade flehen, ihre Lippen sollen versiegelt werden, ihre Hände sollen abgetrennt werden, ihre Seelen sollen geerntet und gegeißelt werden!"
languages.original_text: {n}With a solemn gesture of his hands, Uralon thunders in fury,{/n} "Let those who blaspheme against the True Gods beg forgiveness in vain, let their lips be sealed, let their hands be severed, let their souls be reaped and scourged!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einer feierlichen Geste donnert Uralon zornig los:{/n} "Alle, die Blasphemie gegen die Wahren Götter begehen, sollen vergeblich um Gnade flehen, ihre Lippen sollen versiegelt werden, ihre Hände sollen abgetrennt werden, ihre Seelen sollen geerntet und gegeißelt werden!"
